text: The Ekushey Padak in Education and research winners are listed here. ==List of winners== key posthumous winners ===1970s=== Year Winners Ref. 1976 Muhammad Qudrat-i-Khuda Muhammad Mansuruddin 1977 Ibrahim Khan AKM Ayub Ali 1978 not given 1979 Muhammad Enamul Haque ===1980s=== Year Winners Ref. 1980 Mohammad Fedaus Khan 1981 Mustafa Nurul Islam 1982 Abdul Hakim Khan Bahadur 1983 M A Quddus 1984 Anisuzzaman Habibur Rahman 1985 Abdullah Al-Muti Govinda Chandra Dev Mohammad Abdul Jabbar 1986 not given 1987 Ahmad Shamsul Islam M. A. Naser Abul Kashem 1988 not given 1989 Mahmud Shah Qureshi ===1990s=== Year Winners Ref. 1990 Lutful Haider Chowdhury 1991 Salahuddin Ahmed A. M. Harun-ar-Rashid 1992 Emajuddin Ahamed Khan Mohammad Salek 1993 Mofazzal Haider Chaudhuri 1994 Mohammad Noman 1995 Abdul Karim Iajuddin Ahmed 1996 Mohammad Abdul Hai Sirajul Islam Chowdhury 1997 Razia Khan Serajul Huq 1998 not given 1999 ===2000s=== Year Winners Ref. 2000 Nilima Ibrahim 2001 Rafiqul Islam Shyamoli Nasrin Chowdhury 2002 Abul Kalam Azad Sharif Hossain Pratibha Mutsuddi 2003 Zebunnessa Rahman Zobeda Khanum Muhammad Ekramul Huq Muhammad Shamsul Huq 2004 Mohammad Moniruzzaman Miah 2005 Abdullah Abu Sayeed Iqbal Mahmud Chittaranjan Saha 2006 Jasimuddin Ahmad Sukomal Barua Anwara Begum M. Asaduzzaman 2007 not given 2008 Muzaffar Ahmed 2009 Borhan Uddin Khan Jahangir ===2010s=== Year Winners Ref. 2010 not given 2011 not given 2012 A.K. Nazmul Karim Ajoy Kumar Roy Monsurul Alam Khan 2013 not given 2014 Anupam Sen 2015 MA Mannan Sanat Kumar Saha 2016 not given 2017 Alamgir Muhammad Serajuddin ==Related pages== * List of Ekushey Padak winners in Arts ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Lists of award winners Education and research
